snippet: Prompted by the horror of a murder-suicide carried out by a Kansas City Chiefs football player, Mr. Costas quoted approvingly from a sports column that decried Americans' easy access to guns. The critics came after him on Monday.
abstract: Prompted by the horror of a murder-suicide carried out by a Kansas City Chiefs football player, Mr. Costas quoted approvingly from a sports column that decried Americans' easy access to guns. The critics came after him on Monday.

headline.main: At Halftime, Costas Put Spotlight on Guns. By Morning, the Spotlight Was on Him.
